definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: He shouldered past Tyrion and out of the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 他與提利昂擦肩而過出了船艙。

sentences.english: She passed me in the street without saying hello.
sentences.chinese: 她在街上與我擦肩而過，卻連一聲招呼也沒打。

sentences.english: Occasionally, there are 3,322 young people running pass.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾也有三三兩兩跑步的年輕人擦肩而過。

sentences.english: Pass, such as when pretending to casually looked elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 等擦肩而過時，忽又裝作漫不經心地打量着別處。

sentences.english: That was our brush with history.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣我們曾與歷史擦肩而過。

sentences.english: brushed past the hidden nucleus of Halley's comet in 1986.
sentences.chinese: 在1986年與哈雷彗星擦肩而過並拍下了其核心。

sentences.english: Twice went close to scoring, forcing excellent saves out of Tzorvas.
sentences.chinese: 兩次與進球擦肩而過，迫使佐爾瓦斯做出精彩撲救。

sentences.english: You brush past people. People bump into you.
sentences.chinese: 你和人們擦肩而過，邂逅相遇。

sentences.english: As we know,there are people who have brushes with death.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道，很多人曾和死亡擦肩而過。

sentences.english: When he was snubbed by the Oscars, there was a collective gasp heard around the world.
sentences.chinese: 當他於奧斯卡獎擦肩而過時，全世界都發出了噓聲。

sentences.english: Pain again remember you taught me silent threads by early France.
sentences.chinese: 痛重新來過還記得你教過俺沉默餘溫早經擦肩而過。

sentences.english: I was missing the last bus by a whisker.
sentences.chinese: 我與最後一班公閃車擦肩而過。

sentences.english: After several misses, you continue to wait for this person to walk into your life.
sentences.chinese: 雖幾經擦肩而過，你仍在等待那個人走進你的生活。

sentences.english: As the shadows pass by, a flash, then in the sight dissipated.
sentences.chinese: 就像擦肩而過的人影，一晃，便在視線中消散了。

sentences.english: As the girl drew aside from the trail to pass, he put forth his hand and stopped her.
sentences.chinese: 女孩正要和他擦肩而過時，少年卻伸出手來將她攔住。

sentences.english: Meet you, is my lucky, or just passing by …
sentences.chinese: 遇見你，是幸運之神眷顧我，即使只是與你擦肩而過。

definition: to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
unattainable/far-fetched/out of reach/exceedingly remote or distant
to dash on bravely with no thought of personal safety (idiom); undaunted by dangers/regardless of perils
to have no opportunity/no way (of doing sth)/no chance/no connection/not placed (in a competition)/(in pop lyrics) no chance of love, no place to be together etc
in the end/after all is said and done
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
